Hi there, this is Victoria Hong Kong Tertiary Student Association! As uni elections are near, we would like to gather students who support Hongkongers and value our fight for freedom to support or join the elections to represent our voice. Therefore we would love you to please spare 2 minutes in filling this form out and to spread it to your friends is uni. Thank you so much!
